text: Tasartha juna kauma timibhanda aghi bitisakeka chan, tiniharuma yasta bud'dhimani kina bha'enan, jasale ki mulukama upadrava hunabata rokdathe, ho, kehi (thi'e), jasala'i hamile tiniharumadhyebata bacayaum ra jo atyacari thi'e, yinai kurako pachadi lagirahe, jasama ki tiniharula'i ananda ra vilasita di'i'eko thiyo, ra tiniharu aparadhi thi'e
